MAY 24 1962
General Services Administration/F38 Legion 3 Washington 26, D.C. U. s. A.
Subject:
Excess Property
Gentleson, We have requirement for one Tractor, Bulletin $1, Page 5, Control No. 362-7575, Itos 8, Condition B-1. Please advise availability. If your reply is in the affirmative we will Immediately forward our purchase order.
Sincerely yours,
N H. T. Potter Supply Advisor
